starttown_sign_welcome: Welcome to West Hull - Tidal Quarter.
Skyspan Crossing to the west. Founders District eastbound.
marina_sign: Marina Edge Route: Boardwalk slick in rain.
Keep Fog Lanterns ready at dusk.
founders_sign: Founders Lane: cobbles, stories, and strange echoes.
trialhall_sign: Arena of Tides Cultural Trial hosted inside.
pq_exterior_sign: Centre sits over the water basin.
pq_topdeck_food: Chip Spice stall and pattie counter open until late.
pq_topdeck_cinema: Cinema Screens 1-4 upstairs. Keep your cinema stub.
pq_interior_water: Look over the railing - water below the structure is visible at high tide.
pq_interior_meeting: Meeting Point: by the central clock, same as always.
pq_interior_topdeck: Escalators up to Top Deck seating and food terrace.
ronnie_intro: A local legend squints at you.
